Title: Southern monarchs visit Uzodimma, appoint him coordinator
Summary: Members of the Technical Committee of monarchs from the Southern states in the Southwest, Southeast and South-South geopolitical zones under the aegis of the Southern Traditional Rulers Council, led by their chairman and Ooni of Ife, Oba Adeyeye Enitan Ogunwusi .

Title: Police uncover kidnappers’ hideouts in Imo, recover decomposing body
Summary: Operatives of the Anti-kidnapping unit of the Imo State Police Command have uncovered criminal hideouts in two communities, Okuku and Ndegwu, in Owerri West Local Government Council of the state . They recovered a decomposing corpse, suspected to be that of a kidnapper .

Title: FiberOne begins Next-Gen Network upgrade to boost broadband experience
Summary: FiberOne Broadband, Nigeria’s leading fiber-to-the-home internet service provider, has commenced a large-scale network transformation across key Lagos communities . as part of its strategic plan to deliver next-generation broadband that is faster, smarter, and more reliable .

Title: 68% of electricity consumers bypassing prepaid meters — FG
Summary: 68 per cent of electricity consumers in Nigeria are illegally bypassing their prepaid meters and consuming power without payment . The Nigerian Independent System Operator (NIS) has revealed .

Title: Bonfrere Jo petitions Senate over  29-year unfulfilled promise
Summary: Bonfrere Jo has turned to the Senate for help — accusing the Lagos State Government . The former Super Eagles coach led Nigeria to global football glory at the 1996 Atlanta Olympics .

Title: Bellingham, Foden recalled to England squad for World Cup qualifiers
Summary: Jude Bellingham and Phil Foden recalled to England squad for World Cup qualifiers against Serbia and Albania . Thomas Tuchel recalled the duo ahead of World Cup qualifier against Serbia .

Title: Ogun police arrest two Cameroonians for alleged kidnapping, human trafficking
Summary: Ogun police arrest two Cameroonians for alleged kidnapping, human trafficking . Suspects were arrested following a distress call from a Cameroonian victim who escaped captivity .

Title: Breaking: Court fixes Nov 20 for judgment in Kanu’s trial for alleged terrorism
Summary: Kanu, on Friday, filed a motion wherein he challenged the competence of the charge and the jurisdiction of the court to try him . Rather, Kanu said he was not being tried for terrorism but for alleged terrorism .

Title: 18 held in Turkish probe into football referees betting scandal
Summary: Eighteen people are being held in Turkey in a probe into referees suspected of betting on football matches . The Istanbul prosecutor's office said Friday .

Title: ‘No godfatherism in 2027,’ Shinkafi warns APC in Zamfara
Summary: Alhaji (Dr.) Sani Abdullahi Shinkafi has warned that only credible and transparent primaries will determine who emerges as the party’s flagbearer for the 2027 general elections . He insisted that every aspirant, regardless of their background, should be allowed to run for the party .
